properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 23 at 12:33PM CST until January 27 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Tennessee River...

Tennessee River at Savannah affecting Decatur and Hardin Counties

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the Tennessee River at Savannah
* from Thursday January 23 until Monday January 27.
* At 11 AM Thursday the stage was 367.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 370 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall through the end of
the week.
* At 368 feet...House lots on the north end of Emerald Lane at
Hooker's Bend are beginning to flood. Water is backing into most
sloughs.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued Friday or sooner if conditions
warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
